verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stock indexes] [V: edged] [ARG5: up] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-TMP: as investors made preparations for President Trump 's meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore . Investors showed little concern over the swipes Trump took at Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] .
